analysis.key_quote: Undermining the professional independence of program officers risks politicizing research priorities, eroding public trust in science, and jeopardizing the merit-based evaluation processes that ensure funding supports the most rigorous and impactful work.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the integrity of scientific funding, and the importance of merit-based evaluation processes, which are all critical indicators of opposition to the rule.
